data.title: Rage Against The Machine Renegades Of Funk Lyrics
meta_keywords: Renegades Of Funk lyrics by Rage Against The Machine
download lyrics of Renegades Of Funk by Rage Against The Machine
Rage Against The Machine Renegades Of Funk lyrics mp3 download
data.meta_description: Renegades Of Funk lyrics by Rage Against The Machine, listen and download latest songs of Rage Against The Machine with lyrics on Boomplay.
data.text:
No matter how hard you try, you can't stop us now <x2>

No matter how hard you try, you can't stop us now <x1>

Since the Prehistoric ages and the days of ancient Greece

Right down through the Middle Ages

Planet earth kept going through changes

And then no renaissance came, and times continued to change

Nothing stayed the same, but there were always renegades

Like Chief Sitting Bull, Tom Paine

Dr. Martin Luther King, Malcom X

They were renegades of their time and age

So many renegades

We're the renegades of funk <x2>

We're the renegades of funk <x1>

From a different solar system many many galaxies away

We are the force of another creation

A new musical revelation

And we're on this musical mission to help the others listen

And groove from land to land singin' electronic chants like

Zulu nation

Revelations

Destroy all nations <x2>

Destroy all nations <x1>

Now renegades are the people with their own philosophies

They change the course of history

Everyday people like you and me

We're the renegades we're the people

With our own philosophies

We change the course of history

C'mon

Poppin', sockin', rockin' puttin' a side of hip-hop

Because where we're goin' there ain't no stoppin'

Poppin', sockin', puttin' a side of hip-hop

'Cause we're poppin', sockin', rockin' puttin' a side of hip-hop

We're teachers of the funk

And not of empty popping

We're blessed with the force and the sight of electronics

With the bass, and the treble the horns and our vocals

'Cause everytime I pop into the beat we get fresh

cool

come on

There was a time when our music

Was something called the Bay Street beat

People would gather from all around

To get down to the big sound

You had to be a renegade in those days

To take a man to the dance floor

Say jam sucker (jam sucker) <x2>

Say jam sucker (jam sucker) <x1>

Say groove sucker (move sucker) <x2>

Say groove sucker (move sucker) <x1>

Say dance sucker (dance sucker) <x2>

Say dance sucker (dance sucker) <x1>

Now move sucker (move sucker) <x2>

Now move sucker (move sucker) <x1>

We're the renegades of funk <x8>

We're the renegades of funk <x7>

We're the renegades of funk <x6>

We're the renegades of funk <x5>

We're the renegades of funk <x4>

We're the renegades of funk <x3>
